caption: Clear
doc: When invoked, will empty all keys out of the storage.

AAX.caption: When invoked, will empty all keys out of the storage.
AAX.name: information

AAb.caption: Local Query
AAb.doc: Whether or not the local or the session storage was queried. "Yes" local storage. "No" session storage.
AAb.name: local

AAc.caption: Query Context
AAc.doc: Identifier of the latest storage query, developer specified.
AAc.name: context
